buwa - mama mathukala dewal seratama uththara labila naha.kohoma wunath waidya upadhiyak laksha deka thunata denna baha kiyala ethakota oba piligannawane.injineru ekak dennath bahane.koliti sayans digriyak ee ganata dennath bahane.neda?ethakota eewata adalawa mama ara kiwa karanaya balapanawa neda?waraprasada lath ha nolath kiyala dekak bihiwima.anika prayiwat eewa labhaya aramunu karagaththama wena prashnaya ganath oya mukuth kiyala nahane.mama kos ekak kala nuwara infomatiks eke.mama tika kalayak karala wade athhariya.eeke hodata therenawa un patta boruwak karanne kiyala.nikam salli walata kerena wadak.ada ispirithala walata wela thiyena eka prayiwat yuni hinda wiwi walata wenawa.salli godak haw nam apalo.kisi awulak naha dosthara lagatama enawa.salli tikak haw nam suwasewana.ihamola okkoma huragena kanawa.habayi samanyayen hoda sarwis ekak.salli naththan - ape rate bahutharaya ehemayi.siyayata 80%-90% wage) aanduwe ispirithala.adawal naha.beheth naha.polima.ful katta.meka machan umbaalata awulak nathi wenna puluwan.eeth ara samanya minissuntayi ee asamanathawaya danenne.dan oya pelapali yanna uthsaha karanneth ee ayage lamayi.unta aduma tharamin pelapaliyakwawath yanna aanduwa denne naha habayi namalge kar sellam walata dawas ganan parawal wahanawa.mokakda ban me asadharanaya?prajathanthrawadaya arawa mewa gana budu toks dena oyala me karana nodakka wage inne ayi?eekayi mama kiwwe lankawe sandarbhaya athule idan meka kathakaranna.-
